original_title: У всех мужчин должны быть туфли
overview: The film is from the project "Iluminator", working with the theme of acceptance by parents of LGBT children. Have you ever had doubts that you were born the wrong person? Probably, yes. But, unfortunately, not everything is solved by a healthy sleep or eating the fifth ice cream cup in a day. Sometimes you need to decide to become who you really feel like.
title: All Men Should Have Shoes
